item.title: codecrap.com - snippet #404
item.description:
doSomeCalculations();
doSomeCalculations(); //It is called again just in case

item.title: codecrap.com - snippet #403
item.description:
//if texture is in the second loop and the texture list only has one in it so [0] is only vaild fill spec and normal with zeroes 
   if (iTextures == 0) 
   { 
    //Spec name size 
    binStream.write((char*)0, sizeof(char*)); 
    //Spec name 
    binStream.write((char*)0, sizeof(char*)); 
    //Normal name size 
    binStream.write((char*)0, sizeof(char*)); 
    //Normal name 
    binStream.write((char*)0, sizeof(char*)); 
    break; 
   }

item.title: codecrap.com - snippet #398
item.description:
// FUUU computer, it works well on my head!
#include 

int main()
{
    int n, factorial, i;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    factorial = 1;
    for(i = 2; i <= n; i++); // LOL
    {
      factorial = factorial * i;
    }
    printf("your factorial is: %d\n", factorial);
    return 0;
}

item.title: codecrap.com - snippet #397
item.description:
/**
	 * Sets the name.
	 * 
	 * @param name
	 *            the name to set
	 */
	public void setName(String name)
	{
		this.name = name;
	}

item.title: codecrap.com - snippet #395
item.description:
static public void assertEquals(String actual, String expected, String message) {
    assertEquals((Object) actual, (Object) expected, message);
  }
